title: No chests despite plenty of S- and above
body: I have not seen a chest in months despite grading better than S- many times. I feel like I'm owed 30 or more chests due to this error. How do I go about getting a riot employee to look in on this?

replies.body: Looks like you've been playing the same champions over and over. Keep in mind you can only earn one of those mastery chests per champion per season.
Per champion per season? if that's correct then that is my issue.

Yep, one mastery chest for a champion and only once per season. You can reference all the details on the [**hextech crafting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233)!

> Once you earn a chest from achieving S rank on a champion, you won’t be able to earn another with that champion until the end of the season. You can see which champions you’ve earned chests with in your profile’s Champions tab. This chest cap resets each season.
